       <div id="wrapbox21306418">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21306418">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21306418">
          <div class="bi_video">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Find Background Information on a Topic
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_7" id="content21249436">
          <div id="boxatt21249436" class="boxatt">
           <div class="embedclass">
            <img src="http://corp.credoreference.com/images/logos/Credo-Black-landscape-%20147x50.png" alt="Credo Logo" />
            <form action="javascript:void;" onsubmit="javascript:return credoMultiSearchBasic(document.forms.credoMultiSearchFormBasic);" method="GET" name="credoMultiSearchFormBasic">
             <input type="hidden" name="ubasic" value="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/search/advanced/?include={0}&amp;headingsOnly=false&amp;sort=relevance" />
             <label for="qbasic">
              Search
             </label>
             <input type="text" id="qbasic" value="" size="15" />
             <input type="image" border="0" name="Submit" value="search" src="http://literati.credoreference.com/images/tools/go_button.png" alt="Submit Button" width="54" height="31" style="top:10px; position:relative;" />
             <br />
             <script type="text/javascript">
              function credoMultiSearchBasic(f){if(f.qbasic.value=='Search for...'||f.qbasic.value==''){alert('Please enter a search.');}else{var qbasic=escape(f.qbasic.value);var ubasic=f.ubasic.value.replace("{0}",qbasic);window.open(ubasic,"_blank");}return false;}
             </script>
            </form>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10107797">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10107797">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10107797">
          <div class="bi_search">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10107797">
          <div id="boxatt10107797" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10107797">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10107797" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10107797').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

             <li id="link24958579">
              <a id="link_24958579" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/nosongbehind" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24958579,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24958579});">
               No Song Left Behind
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link22991307">
              <a id="link_22991307" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/becomedeath" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991307,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22991307});">
               Now I am Become Death
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link23143154">
              <a id="link_23143154" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/persuasiondeception" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23143154,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23143154});">
               Persuasion, Manipulation, and Deception
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link25019065">
              <a id="link_25019065" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/fairytales" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25019065,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25019065});">
               Reading Fairy Tales
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link24094477">
              <a id="link_24094477" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/lolita" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24094477,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24094477});">
               Reading Lolita
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18541582">
              <a id="link_18541582" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/representbody" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18541582,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18541582});">
               Representing Body in Art
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18352762">
              <a id="link_18352762" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/representrevolution" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18352762,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18352762});">
               Representing the Age of Revolution
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link22997079">
              <a id="link_22997079" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/roadtrip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22997079,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22997079});">
               Road Trip: American Literature &amp; Film
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link20430963">
              <a id="link_20430963" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=571230" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20430963,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20430963});">
               Sustainabilty: Digging Deeper
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link14366197">
              <a id="link_14366197" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/politicsmemory" target="_blank" onclick="hit(14366197,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 14366197});">
               The Politics of Memory
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link23985249">
              <a id="link_23985249" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/davinci" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23985249,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23985249});">
               Think Like Leonard da Vinci
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link17955054">
              <a id="link_17955054" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/digitalworld" target="_blank" onclick="hit(17955054,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 17955054});">
               Who Controls Your Digital World?
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link24822137">
              <a id="link_24822137" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/whywework" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24822137,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24822137});">
               Why We Work
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10107722">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10107722">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10107722">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10107722">
          <div id="boxatt10107722" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12618737">
              <a id="link_12618737" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12618737,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12618767">
              <a id="link_12618767" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12618767,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618767}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12618814">
              <a id="link_12618814" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12618814,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618814}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database with some full text articles covering various academic subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12618824">
              <a id="link_12618824" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12618824,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618824}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A full-text database with journal articles in the arts, humanities, and social sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12618708">
              <a id="link_12618708" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://online.sagepub.com/cgi/search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12618708,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618708}); ">
               Sage Journals Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals published by Sage, providing wide coverage in all disciplines, but particularly the social sciences.  Full text for articles published 1999 to the present is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles to check for the library's other full text or physical copies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12618696">
              <a id="link_12618696" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.springerlink.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12618696,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618696}); ">
               Springerlink
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,700 journals from Springer-Verlag with coverage from 1997 to present. Subjects covered focus on the natural sciences, but also include significant titles in behavioral sciences, humanities, social sciences and law.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10377947">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10377947">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10377947">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10377947">
          <div id="boxatt10377947" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12618718">
              <a id="link_12618718" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12618718,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618718}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12618719">
              <a id="link_12618719" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12618719,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618719}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12619431">
              <a id="link_12619431" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/morningcall/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12619431,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12619431}); ">
               Morning Call
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of articles from the Allentown-based Morning Call newspaper.  Coverage from 1984 to 1 day ago.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24860767">
              <a id="link_24860767" href="http://www.mondotimes.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24860767,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'First Year Seminar (FYS) Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706409}); ">
               Mondo Times -- the Worldwide News Media Guide
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to local media in the United States and worldwide, including newspaper, TV stations, news radio stations, and online news sources.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
